scripts.build: cd fullstack-react-express/frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd fullstack-react-express/frontend && npm run dev" "cd fullstack-react-express/frontend && echo no-backend-started"
scripts.start: cd fullstack-react-express/frontend/node_modules/queue-microtask && npm install && npm run start
scripts.start:dev-backend: cd fullstack-react-express/frontend/node_modules/queue-microtask && npm install && npm run dev || true
